textBeforeTable: The below list indicates which special characters are allowed. The amount of space a character occupies is subtracted from the number of characters allowed on the plate. Personalized Plates require at least one letter or one number. There are no ½ space characters allowed for motorcycle license plates. Special Character Rules Issued to: Registered owner of a motor vehicle in accordance with G.S. 20-81.12. textAfterTable: Special characters will not be considered when determining whether the plate text is available. For example, plate A&3@C is the same as A3C. Error Online payments through Visa, Mastercard, or Discover only. Privacy & Security Statement
